categories: Category:The Official Star Wars Fact File

nodes.text: The Official Star Wars Fact File 2
The Official Star Wars Fact File 2 was the second issue of The Official Star Wars Fact File, released on January 9, 2002. The issue was authored by Chris Gardner, Iain Lowson and Jim Swallow.
The Gamorreans article includes unattributed original artwork depicting Voort "Piggy" saBinring.
